modules.name: Fence
modules.description: Keep CVs in a defined pitch range

modules.name: Phrase
modules.description: Utility to sequence phrases by sequencing a sequencer

modules.name: Dejavu
modules.description: Random Cv and Trigger generator with nested repeat functionality

modules.name: Gator
modules.description: Phased Based Microtiming, Ratcheting and Strumming

modules.name: Resc
modules.description: Utility to harmonicaly rescales pitch from one scale to another scale

modules.name: Morph
modules.description: Morphing of given or random sequences with turing machine functionality

modules.name: Morpheus
modules.description: Morphing of given or random sequences with turing machine functionality and 16 Internal Memory Slots.

modules.name: Buckets
modules.description: Splits up polyphonic pitch and gate input into up to 12 polyphic pitch and gate outputs, depending on pitch value, chainable

modules.name: Cron
modules.description: Interface Module for MIDI>CV deriving BPM from MIDI CLK and 24 pmm CLK/N, handling Transport and calculating CMP cv for GATOR for latency compensation of up to 16 channels
